verses.english: The Inevitable Reality -
verses.hausa: Kiran gaskiya!

verses.english: What is the Inevitable Reality?
verses.hausa: Mẽne ne kiran gaskiya?

verses.english: And what can make you know what is the Inevitable Reality?
verses.hausa: Kuma mẽ ya sanar da kai abin da ake cẽwa kiran gaskiya?

verses.english: Thamud and 'Aad denied the Striking Calamity.
verses.hausa: Samũdãwa da Ãdãwa sun ƙaryatar da kiran gaskiya mai dũkar zũciya!

verses.english: So as for Thamud, they were destroyed by the overpowering [blast].
verses.hausa: To, amma Samũdãwa to, an halakãsu da tsãwa mai tsanani.

verses.arabic: وَأَمَّا عَادٌ فَأُهْلِكُوا۟ بِرِيحٍ صَرْصَرٍ عَاتِيَةٍ
verses.english: And as for 'Aad, they were destroyed by a screaming, violent wind
verses.hausa: Kuma amma Ãdãwa to, an halaka su da wata iska mai tsananin sauti wadda ta ƙẽtare haddi.

verses.arabic: سَخَّرَهَا عَلَيْهِمْ سَبْعَ لَيَالٍ وَثَمَـٰنِيَةَ أَيَّامٍ حُسُومًا فَتَرَى ٱلْقَوْمَ فِيهَا صَرْعَىٰ كَأَنَّهُمْ أَعْجَازُ نَخْلٍ خَاوِيَةٍ
verses.english: Which Allah imposed upon them for seven nights and eight days in succession, so you would see the people therein fallen as if they were hollow trunks of palm trees.
verses.hausa: (Allah) Ya hõre ta a kansu a cikin dare bakwai da yini takwas, biye da jũna, sabõda haka, kana ganin mutãne a cikinta kwance. Kamar sũ ƙirãruwan dabĩno ne, waɗanda suka fãɗi.

verses.english: Then do you see of them any remains?
verses.hausa: To, kõ kanã ganin abin da ya yi saurã daga cikinsu?

verses.arabic: وَجَآءَ فِرْعَوْنُ وَمَن قَبْلَهُۥ وَٱلْمُؤْتَفِكَـٰتُ بِٱلْخَاطِئَةِ
verses.english: And there came Pharaoh and those before him and the overturned cities with sin.
verses.hausa: Kuma Fir'auna yã zo da waɗanda ke gabãninsa, da waɗannan da aka kife ƙasarsu, sabõda laifi.

verses.arabic: فَعَصَوْا۟ رَسُولَ رَبِّهِمْ فَأَخَذَهُمْ أَخْذَةً رَّابِيَةً
verses.english: And they disobeyed the messenger of their Lord, so He seized them with a seizure exceeding [in severity].
verses.hausa: Dõmin sun sãɓã wa manzon Ubangijinsu, sabõda haka ya kãmã su da wani irin kãmu mai ƙãruwar (tsanani).

verses.arabic: إِنَّا لَمَّا طَغَا ٱلْمَآءُ حَمَلْنَـٰكُمْ فِى ٱلْجَارِيَةِ
verses.english: Indeed, when the water overflowed, We carried your ancestors in the sailing ship
verses.hausa: Lalle ne, Mũ, a lõkacin da ruwa ya ƙẽtare haddi, Munɗauke aaku a cikin jirgin ruwan nan.

verses.arabic: لِنَجْعَلَهَا لَكُمْ تَذْكِرَةً وَتَعِيَهَآ أُذُنٌ وَٰعِيَةٌ
verses.english: That We might make it for you a reminder and [that] a conscious ear would be conscious of it.
verses.hausa: Dõmin Mu sanya shi, gare ku abin tunãwa kuma wani kunne mai kiyayewa ya kiyaye (shi).

verses.arabic: فَإِذَا نُفِخَ فِى ٱلصُّورِ نَفْخَةٌ وَٰحِدَةٌ
verses.english: Then when the Horn is blown with one blast
verses.hausa: To, idan an yi bũsa a cikin ƙaho, bũsa ɗaya.

verses.arabic: وَحُمِلَتِ ٱلْأَرْضُ وَٱلْجِبَالُ فَدُكَّتَا دَكَّةً وَٰحِدَةً
verses.english: And the earth and the mountains are lifted and leveled with one blow -
verses.hausa: Kuma aka ɗauki ƙasa da duwãtsu, kuma aka niƙa su niƙãwa ɗaya.

verses.english: Then on that Day, the Resurrection will occur,
verses.hausa: A ran nan, mai aukuwa zã ta auku.

verses.english: And the heaven will split [open], for that Day it is infirm.
verses.hausa: Kuma sama zã ta tsãge, dõmin ita a ran nan, mai rauni ce.

verses.arabic: وَٱلْمَلَكُ عَلَىٰٓ أَرْجَآئِهَا ۚ وَيَحْمِلُ عَرْشَ رَبِّكَ فَوْقَهُمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ ثَمَـٰنِيَةٌ
verses.english: And the angels are at its edges. And there will bear the Throne of your Lord above them, that Day, eight [of them].
verses.hausa: Kuma malã'iku (su bayyana) a kan sãsanninta, kuma wasu (malã'iku) takwas na ɗauke da Al'arshin Ubangijinka, a sama da su, a wannan rãnar.

verses.arabic: يَوْمَئِذٍ تُعْرَضُونَ لَا تَخْفَىٰ مِنكُمْ خَافِيَةٌ
verses.english: That Day, you will be exhibited [for judgement]; not hidden among you is anything concealed.
verses.hausa: A rãnar nan zã a bijirã ku (dõmin hisãbi), bãbu wani rai, mai ɓoyewa, daga cikinku, wanda zai iya ɓõyẽwa.

verses.arabic: فَأَمَّا مَنْ أُوتِىَ كِتَـٰبَهُۥ بِيَمِينِهِۦ فَيَقُولُ هَآؤُمُ ٱقْرَءُوا۟ كِتَـٰبِيَهْ
verses.english: So as for he who is given his record in his right hand, he will say, "Here, read my record!
verses.hausa: To, amma wanda aka bai wa littãfinsa a dãmansa, sai ya ce wa (makusantansa), "Ku karɓa, ku karanta littafina."

verses.english: Indeed, I was certain that I would be meeting my account."
verses.hausa: "Lalle ne ni, nã tabbata cewa ni mai haɗuwa da hisãbina ne."

verses.english: So he will be in a pleasant life -
verses.hausa: Sabõda haka, shi yana cikin wata rãyuwa yardadda.

verses.english: In an elevated garden,
verses.hausa: A cikin Aljanna maɗaukakiya.

verses.english: Its [fruit] to be picked hanging near.
verses.hausa: Nunannun 'yã'yan itãcenta makusantã ne (ga mai son ɗĩba),

verses.arabic: كُلُوا۟ وَٱشْرَبُوا۟ هَنِيٓـًٔۢا بِمَآ أَسْلَفْتُمْ فِى ٱلْأَيَّامِ ٱلْخَالِيَةِ
verses.english: [They will be told], "Eat and drink in satisfaction for what you put forth in the days past."
verses.hausa: (Ana ce musu) "Ku ci, kuma ku sha a cikin ni'ima, sabõda abin da kuka gabãtar a cikin kwãnukan da suka shige."

verses.arabic: وَأَمَّا مَنْ أُوتِىَ كِتَـٰبَهُۥ بِشِمَالِهِۦ فَيَقُولُ يَـٰلَيْتَنِى لَمْ أُوتَ كِتَـٰبِيَهْ
verses.english: But as for he who is given his record in his left hand, he will say, "Oh, I wish I had not been given my record
verses.hausa: Kuma wanda aka bai wa littãfinsa ga hagunsa, sai ya ce: "Kaitona, ba a kãwo mini littãfina ba!"

verses.english: And had not known what is my account.
verses.hausa: "Kuma ban san abin da (ke sakamakon) hisãbina ba!"

verses.english: I wish my death had been the decisive one.
verses.hausa: "In dã dai ita, tã kasance mai halakã ni gabã ɗaya ce!

verses.english: My wealth has not availed me.
verses.hausa: "Dukiyãta ba ta wadatar da ni ba!"

verses.english: Gone from me is my authority."
verses.hausa: "Ĩkona ya ɓace mini!"

verses.english: [Allah will say], "Seize him and shackle him.
verses.hausa: (Sai a ce wa malã'iku) "Ku kãmã shi, sa'an nan ku sanyã shi a cikin ƙuƙumi."

verses.english: Then into Hellfire drive him.
verses.hausa: "Sa'an nan, a cikin Jahĩm, ku ƙõna shi."

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ فِى سِلْسِلَةٍ ذَرْعُهَا سَبْعُونَ ذِرَاعًا فَٱسْلُكُوهُ
verses.english: Then into a chain whose length is seventy cubits insert him."
verses.hausa: "Sa'an nan, acikin sarƙa, tsawonta zirã'i saba'in, sai ku sanya shi."

verses.arabic: إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ لَا يُؤْمِنُ بِٱللَّهِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ
verses.english: Indeed, he did not used to believe in Allah, the Most Great,
verses.hausa: "Lalle ne, shi ya kasance ba ya yin ĩmãni da Allah, Mai girma!"

verses.english: Nor did he encourage the feeding of the poor.
verses.hausa: "Kuma ba ya kwaɗaitarwa ga (bãyar da) abincin matalauci!"

verses.english: So there is not for him here this Day any devoted friend
verses.hausa: "Sabõda haka, a yau, a nan, bã ya da masõyi."

verses.english: Nor any food except from the discharge of wounds;
verses.hausa: "Kuma bãbu wani abinci, sai daga (itãcen) gislĩn."

verses.english: None will eat it except the sinners.
verses.hausa: "Bãbu mai cin sa sai mãsu ganganci."

verses.english: So I swear by what you see
verses.hausa: To, ba sai Nã yi rantsuwa da abin da kuke iya gani ba,

verses.english: And what you do not see
verses.hausa: Da abin da bã ku iya gani.

verses.english: [That] indeed, the Qur'an is the word of a noble Messenger.
verses.hausa: Lalle ne, shi (Alƙur'ani) tabbas maganar wani manzo (Jibirilu) mai daraja ne.

verses.arabic: وَمَا هُوَ بِقَوْلِ شَاعِرٍ ۚ قَلِيلًا مَّا تُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.english: And it is not the word of a poet; little do you believe.
verses.hausa: Kuma shi ba maganar wani mawãƙi ba ne. Kaɗan ƙwarai zã ku gaskata.

verses.arabic: وَلَا بِقَوْلِ كَاهِنٍ ۚ قَلِيلًا مَّا تَذَكَّرُونَ
verses.english: Nor the word of a soothsayer; little do you remember.
verses.hausa: Kuma bã maganar bõka ba ne. Kaɗan ƙwarai zã ku iya tunãwa.

verses.english: [It is] a revelation from the Lord of the worlds.
verses.hausa: Abin saukarwã ne daga Ubangijin halitta duka.

verses.english: And if Muhammad had made up about Us some [false] sayings,
verses.hausa: Kuma dã (Muhammadu) yã faɗi wata maganã, yã jingina ta garẽ Mu.

verses.english: We would have seized him by the right hand;
verses.hausa: Dã Mun kãma shi da dãma.

verses.english: Then We would have cut from him the aorta.
verses.hausa: sa'an nan, lalle ne, dã Mun kãtse masa lakã.

verses.arabic: فَمَا مِنكُم مِّنْ أَحَدٍ عَنْهُ حَـٰجِزِينَ
verses.english: And there is no one of you who could prevent [Us] from him.
verses.hausa: Kuma daga cikinku bãbu wasu mãsu iya kãre (azãbarMu) daga gare shi.

verses.english: And indeed, the Qur'an is a reminder for the righteous.
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle ne shi (Alƙur'ãni) tanãtarwa ce ga mãsu taƙawa.

verses.english: And indeed, We know that among you are deniers.
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle, ne Mũ, wallahi Munã sane da cẽwa daga cikinku alwwai mãsu ƙaryatãwa.

verses.english: And indeed, it will be [a cause of] regret upon the disbelievers.
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle ne shi (Alƙarãni) wallahi baƙin ciki ne ga kãfirai.

verses.english: And indeed, it is the truth of certainty.
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle, ne shi gaskiya ce ta yaƙshẽni.

verses.english: So exalt the name of your Lord, the Most Great.
verses.hausa: Sabõda haka, ka tsarkake sũnan Ubangjinka, mai girma.
